Sentencas: Lithium-doped vanadates (V2-xLixO5-delta (0.15 <= x <= 0.30)) are synthesized by melt-quench method.
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems

Sentencas: The physical, structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of as-quenched samples are investigated using various experimental techniques to study their suitability for electrolyte in battery/solid oxide fuel cell application.
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns confirm the formation of three different crystalline phases.
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems

Sentencas: FTIR and Raman spectra indicate that the doping of Li2O into V2O5 leads to a transition from VO5 into VO4 structural unit.
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems

Sentencas: The optical diffused reflectance spectra revealed that the optical band gap (E-g) decreases from 2.2 to 2.08 eV while Urbach energy (E-U) increases (0.31-0.41 eV) with the addition of Li2O content in place of vanadium.
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems

Sentencas: The thermal stability is studied by thermogravimetric analyser (TGA).
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems

Sentencas: The DC conductivity of the present samples is increased from 0.08 to 0.12 Scm(-1) at 450 degrees C with Li2O doping.
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems

Sentencas: These materials can be used as electrolyte for battery/solid oxide fuel cell due to their good conductivity (similar to 0.12 Scm(-1)) at 450 degrees C.
Titulo: Structural, optical, thermal and conducting properties of V2-xLixO5-δ (0.15 ≤ x ≤ 0.30) systems
